title: Moonlight Journey
description:
Wolves on a plane? Probably easier to travel with snakes. 
Our investigation might be taking some crazy turns, but we’re a pack: we’re on this journey together, for better or worse. Now, though, it’s time for a change. Not only shamans, magical dreams, and all-you-can-eat buffets—no, even better. It’s time to let these wolves sing… 
This is Book 6 in The Witch and the Wolf Pack series.
author: K.R. Alexander
